panels.content: Data From John Hopkins University: https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19 NB: Data is reliant on formal testing taking place so is not 100% accurate, This also affects Mortality rate Calculation

targets.query: Select last(confirmed) as time, time as timestamp from covid19

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

Doesnt filter as Population of world hard coded

Future Improvement to Store Country Populations

targets.query: SELECT sum("confirmed")/7530000000 as "Population Infected" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."covid19" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

targets.query: SELECT sum("deaths")/(sum("recovered")+sum("deaths")) as "Mortality Rate" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."covid19" WHERE $timeFilter and "country"=~ /$Country/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description: These are running total's rather than calculating active cases etc.

targets.query: SELECT sum("recovered")/(sum("recovered")+sum("deaths")) as "Recovery Rate" FROM "covid19"."autogen"."covid19" WHERE $timeFilter and "country"=~ /$Country/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW FIELD KEYS ON covid19 FROM covid19
list.name: Fields
list.query: SHOW FIELD KEYS ON covid19 FROM covid19

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES on covid19 from covid19 with KEY=country
list.name: Country
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES on covid19 from covid19 with KEY=country
